column2: Rekor Systems, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of products and services to both government and private sector clients, with an emphasis on public safety, risk management, and workforce solutions. The company is headquartered in Columbia, Maryland and currently employs 505 full-time employees. The firm is focused on the logistics of procuring critical human resources. The firm formed a platform that provides an array of services including strategic advisory, business capture support, teaming and staffing of skilled, non-skilled and cleared personnel, crisis and risk management, and traditional and digital media communications. The firm also provides training, consulting, coaching, and implementation tools that help individuals. The firm provides safety technology service fully integrated automated traffic safety enforcement solutions, parking enforcement citation collections, and mobile technology equipment solutions for public safety agencies.
